name: viburnum bodnantense
description: The name Viburnum Ã— bodnantense, the Bodnant viburnum, is used for a group of hybrid flowering plant cultivars of garden origin.

name: parrotia persica
description: Parrotia persica (commonly called Persian ironwood) is a deciduous tree in the family Hamamelidaceae, closely related to the witch-hazel genus Hamamelis.

name: sarcococca confusa
description: Sarcococca confusa, the sweet box, is a species of flowering plant in the family Buxaceae, probably native to western China.

name: abeliophyllum distichum
description: Abeliophyllum, the miseonnamu, Korean abeliophyllum, white forsythia, or Korean abelialeaf, is a monotypic genus of flowering plants in the olive family, Oleaceae.

name: abeliophyllum distichum
description: Crocus chrysanthus (snow crocus, golden crocus) is a species of flowering plant of the Crocus genus in the family Iridaceae. Native to the Balkans and Turkey, it bears vivid orange-yellow bowl-shaped flowers.

name: prunus persica
description: The peach (Prunus persica) is a deciduous tree native to the region of Northwest China between the Tarim Basin and the north slopes of the Kunlun Mountains, where it was first domesticated and cultivated.
